CustomField.description: This field determines behavior of Error Handling while sending Survey Invitations. Supported Values: 0 and 1.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field determines behavior of error handling while sending survey invitations. 0 - Import recipient with valid prepopulation data, discards only invalid prepop data 1 [Recommended] â€“ Imports recipient without any error, rejects in case of any error
CustomField.label: Sample Error Handling Rule
